text: Komaravolu S. Chandrashekhar (21 November 1920 – 13 April 2017) was an Indian- Swiss professor at ETH Zurich.Komaravolu Chandrashekhar He was a founding faculty member of School of Mathematics, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research (TIFR). He was known for his work in number theory and summability and was given numerous awards including Padma Shri, Shanti Swarup Bhatnagar Award, Ramanujan Medal, and Honorary fellow of TIFR. ==References== ==Other websites== * – India's who is who Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Indian academics Category:Swiss mathematicians Category:Indian mathematicians Category:Number theorists Category:Scientists from Zürich
title: K. S. Chandrasekharan
